org.opendaylight.controller.switchmanager

Interface ISpanAware


  • public interface ISpanAware
    The interface provides the methods for notifying when span ports are configured/unconfigured.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void spanUpdate(Node node, java.util.List<NodeConnector> portList, boolean add)
      This method is called when list of ports in a node are added/deleted as span ports.

    • Method Detail

      • spanUpdate

        void spanUpdate(Node node,
              java.util.List<NodeConnector> portList,
              boolean add)
        This method is called when list of ports in a node are added/deleted as span ports.
        Parameters:
        node - Node being updated
        portList - list of span NodeConnector
        add - true if add; false if delete.
